data.title: BioReference on LinkedIn: In honor of Customer Service Week, BioReference is proud to announce…
data.meta_description: In honor of Customer Service Week, BioReference is proud to announce Jennifer as our new MVP! Jennifer's nomination was accompanied by raving reviews from her…
data.text:
Are you attending #ASCO24? Meet our team at Booth 10086, and let's discuss how GenPath®, a specialty division of BioReference Health® can significantly enhance your #oncology diagnostic testing needs.

Heading to #ASCO24? Meet us at booth #10086 to explore our latest innovations in #oncology diagnostic testing, including our new #HRD (Homologous Recombination Deficiency) test, and discover how our comprehensive tests and services can streamline your oncology #diagnostic testing services.

BioReference® honors laboratory professionals and pathologists during the 49th Annual Lab Week. We thank our dedicated lab professionals for making healthcare delivery possible. Please read our blog here https://lnkd.in/exGzCNud

BioReference® is pleased to offer CINtec® PLUS Cytology, the only FDA approved dual-stain triage test for HPV positive cervical cancer screening results. “Dual-stain triage provides excellent discrimination between HPV-positive individuals requiring direct colposcopy and those who can be safely followed in one year”- Dr. Tamera Paczos, OBGYN and former Sr. VP Chief Laboratory Officer.

BioReference Health®, LLC, an OPKO Health Company, has entered into a definitive agreement to sell certain assets of its clinical laboratory business to Labcorp. BioReference will continue its national correction, urology/4Kscore, and oncology specialty services, and will maintain its full operation in New York and New Jersey. Learn more here: https://lnkd.in/e2szm9Cp

This month is dedicated to raising awareness about cervical cancer, it is crucial to emphasize the significance of early detection and prevention of this prevalent but preventable disease. This Cervical Cancer Awareness Month, we are delighted to announce the collaborative efforts of BioReference Health™ and Teal Health in supporting a groundbreaking HPV study that aims to revolutionize cervical cancer screening. #CervicalCancerAwareness #EarlyDetection #Prevention #TEALHealth Click the link to learn more: https://lnkd.in/eF66SjqD

If you are at American Society of Hematology's Annual meeting and expo this weekend in #SanDiego, be sure to stop by booth 142 to talk with BioReference® and GenPath Oncology about our OnkoSuite™ of products including the OnkoSight® Advanced and OnkoClone. #ASH23

Are you attending the American Society of Hematology Annual Meeting? Our team would love to connect! Meet us at booth 142 starting tomorrow in #SanDiego to learn how GenPath Oncology's comprehensive test offerings can support the continuum of care for patients with blood disorders. #ASH23 #hematology #laboratorymedicine #cancerresearch

In the world of healthcare, data has become essential to driving better patient outcomes. From clinical records to genomic insights, the convergence of various data sources is revolutionizing research and development (R&D) in pharmaceutical companies. Explore the remarkable potential of real-world data (RWD), particularly in oncology, and how its integration can lead to groundbreaking advancements in cancer treatment. ➡️ https://bit.ly/488nt8S #rwd #realworlddata #cancertreatment #cancerresearch #OncologyDiagnostics #ClinicalResearch
